name: Neraxis
subtitle: Obsidian Arrogance
description: The descendant of a black dragon that controlled dark lightning. He fights to rid the world of the demons, especially the Draconics. The energy of dark lightning imbued in his Pile Bunker penetrates the enemy's defense.
story: Black dragons are notorious for being the most arrogant and ill-tempered out of all dragons. They suffered greatly from the Demon War 100 years ago. Armarta went mad, Ashen Nox robbed them, and Draconics started hunting down dragons. Neraxis was one of the few black dragon that survived that day, and he has been working and plotting to realize his revenge.
dislike: Demons, Cain, Lilia, and everything that gets in his way.

inn.idle: Hmpf. What am I even doing here...?

recruit.greet: Hmph, what does a human want with me?
recruit.gift: I don't know what you want, but it's no use.

talk: Huh? You want help? Hmpf. Bothersome.
Ha, that's right. Black dragons are the strongest!
affinity.gift: I don't need that. Why do you keep...?

relationship.greet: ...Fine, I'm glad to see you! Hmpf...
talk: Lilia? Ah, that annoying kid? Tsk, she always gets in the way.
Why won't that mummy get lost? Sometimes I really want to kill him.
Why do I like Laias? Hmph, y-you don't need a reason to like someone... No, wait! How did you know!?

uw.story: A magic gear crafted with pitch-black metal called Adamantite, tempered with the dark flame and the lightning of a black dragon. It holds the grudge and rage of black dragons that were killed during the Demon War. Neraxis threatened the dwarves to forge this special weapon for him. Then, he cursed and enchanted it with the grudge-filled souls of black dragons. Anyone who touches this weapon beside Neraxis will hear the raging roars of vengeful dragons.
